CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y build-essential &&     apt-get install -y software-properties-common &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo oracle-java8-installer shared/accepted-oracle-license-v1-1 select true | debconf-set-selections &&     add-apt-repository -y ppa:webupd8team/java &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y oracle-java8-installer &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     rm -rf /var/cache/oracle-jdk8-installer
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y mysql-server mysql-client &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y maven &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
